item.title: CNHI
item.description: score:231 Chances: CNHI has completed the voluntary delisting of its shares from Euronext Milan and is now solely listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), which may lead to increased visibility and access for American investors. The company has been simplifying its operations, as seen in the completion of the â‚¬400 million component of its $1 billion share buyback program, which could indicate a positive outlook for shareholders.
